comments.html: Of course you could do that (and get 4x the number of ports in the ideal case), but the wiring tends to be a mess.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html:
I see that the smaller example uses 6 spines. Wouldn't it be possible to use 24 spines with 40G to 4x10G breakouts (40gbase-lr4 to 4x10gbase-lr)?
Counting for the Trident II limit of 104 interfaces we should reach 4992 10G ports out of 104 leaf and 24 spines?
comments.name: Maxime
